attributes.action: Re-think the causes of global warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the Prime Minister to examine in more detail the true causes of global warming. The evidence that humans are the cause of global warming is poor and many studies have dis-proved the theory of man made global warming. Please don't dismiss this petition, this is a serious issue and there is no need to waste tax payers money.
